docs.abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Football column profiles Seattle Seahawks quarterback Russell Wilson, saying his compelling personal story has been overshadowed; notes that Wilson has overcome adversity to win more games as a starter than any other quarterback in his first two seasons during the Super Bowl era.
